name: micellar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
containing or relating to micelles (= groups of molecules found in certain chemical solutions): The phase boundaries of micellar solutions strongly depend on added salt.
More examplesFewer examplesUnsaturated fatty acids were more abundant in the micellar phase.Temperature shifts of the cosolution boundary are interpreted in terms of micellar solubility.Small molecules may be delivered to the central nervous system utilizing techniques designed to overcome the blood-brain barrier, such as through liposomal or micellar delivery.
